Room.Name: Dark Path
Room.ShortDescription: The forest path seems to split here, going around a large oak tree.
Room.LongDescription: The path to the northwest leads towards a freshly cleared area where you can smell cooking and woodsmoke in the air. The trees don't seem as dense in that direction. The path crosses over a small footbridge spanning a friendly little creek running to the north. The eastern path leads deeper into the dark part of the forest, while the southern path may lead out of the Enchanted Forest.
